title.0: Will Sudan ratify AfCFTA (the pan-African free trade agreement) before July 1, 2025?

question_description.0: [Draft National AfCFTA Implementation Strategy for Sudan Reviewed and Validated by Stakeholders](https://igad.int/draft-national-afcfta-implementation-strategy-for-sudan-reviewed-and-validated-by-stakeholders/)

question_resolution_criteria.0: This question resolves as **Yes** if Sudan ratifies the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) Agreement before July 1, 2025.
